message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm proposing we take $60 and you take $40. The value of the money decreases rapidly, so it's best we settle this quickly.
Alice, your offer was a bit unbalanced. Let's split things a little more evenly this time. This offer considers the time pressure we both face.
Bob, time is running out and the money is losing value. I'm proposing $55 for me and $45 for you.  This is better for you than what you'll get if you reject and I win in round 4.
